meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Todd Federman Jason Shore Lucas Peterson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6488.

td.p: Todd Federman, a professor and education consultant from Livingston, New Jersey
Jason Shore, a medical student from Plano, Texas
Lucas Peterson, an actor originally from Oak Park, Illinois (whose 2-day cash winnings total $33,900)

tr.td: THE OAKLAND "B"s
(Alex: Not the Oakland A's.)
BEASTLY MOVIE TITLES
A LIFE IN BRIEF
MYTHOLOGICAL WORDS & PHRASES
TUESDAYS
WITH MAORI

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Todd: Uh, what is the, um--San Francisco--what\'s the Golden Gate Bridge?)
(Lucas: What\'s the Bay? San Francisco Bay?)

the Bay Bridge

LucasTodd
Triple Stumper
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In November 1936 it began carrying traffic between San Francisco & Oakland across the water it\'s named for')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In November 1936 it began carrying traffic between San Francisco & Oakland across the water it's named for

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
